summary:
Medieval Sword -Oakeshott Type XVIa-
Second installment in the \"Historical Weapons\" line of mods...
descriptionHtml:
Name: Medieval Sword -Oakeshott\'s Type XVIa-
Version: 2.0
Release Date: 5/29/2012
Category: Weapons and Armor
Requirements: Latest Skyrim Version
Author(s): xXKevinSaerXx

[youtube]WNeG0W3muW0?[/youtube]
Skip to 5:06, or watch the entire video ;)

Description
===========
Oakeshott\'s XVIa.
This weapon is a part of the \"Historical Weapons\" line of mods that aims at bringing various historically accurate blades into skyrim. These weapons are top quality swords, always being altered to match the likes of the community!

Location
========
This weapon is crafted under the steel section of the forge.
Though, there seems to be problems for some people downloading this. If the weapon doesent appear at the forge, open the console and type \"help xvia\". The item code will then appear.

Details
=======
Its design is based of the Oakeshott Type XVIa Medieval Sword. The weapon was widely used during the 13/14/15th era. With realistic and HQ textures, the weapon fits in perfectly with skyrims environments.

The weapon is 2 handed with base stats of:
19 damage
13 weight
1900 value

Perfect for low level characters!

Install
=======
1. Just use NMM

Uninstall
=========
1. Deactive and uninstall with NMM

Upgrade
=======
1. Just use NMM

Incompatibility
===============
None...

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None...

History
=======
3/06/2012 Version 2-  
Removed gloss from scabbard and grip. Altered colors of blade, scabbard, and grip. Increased overall quality. Fixed several issues. Added a no scabbard version.

5/29/2012
Initial Release

Contact
=======
Contact me through a PM here on the forums. I always reply!

Credits
=======
-Thanks to the entire nexus community for support and feedback! This mod is for you.
-Thanks to KevSer for allowing me to use the textures and models from his file \"Dragon Sword\".
-Thanks to Brodual for featuring my mod in the \"Bits \'n\' Bob\" mod spotlight series for skyrim.   Subscribe now, at http://www.youtube.com/user/Brodual?feature=watch


Tools Used
==========
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like
to know what mods are including my work.
author: xXKevinSaerXx
